title: Rumored PS5 Pro Specs, Release Date - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.19.24
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://robinhood.com/boost to subscribe to Robinhood Gold and get a 3% match on every dollar you transfer in from another retirement account. Offer good through April 30th.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:34 - Housekeeping
 - We’re back after doing our 6-hour stream of 14+ games yesterday. If you missed the Spring Game Showcase LIVE, catch it on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
      -  The Roper Report   -
00:11:05 - PS5 Pro Rumors
00:31:06 - PSVR 2 Pauses Production
00:39:31 - Persona 6 is Xbox Bound?
00:42:45 - Xbox Game Pass Update
00:45:15 - Alone in the Dark Review Round-Up
00:48:15 - Wee News!
00:53:59 - SuperChats
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & ????
